content:
Silberlust family

1 Leizer SILBERLUST                  1804
 + Baila Reisel                      1808 (Dawid)
  2x Leibel Dawid SILBERLUST         1828 #116 - after 1890
    + Sara ALTENDORF                 1828-29 Chrzanow - after 1890
          married Feb 19, 1893 #91
     3x Ojzer Nachman SILBERLUST     Jul 12, 1852 #342 - 1852 #342

       + Scheindel Simche Szarlotte BRYNDZE  Feb 15, 1859 #1762
             married Sep 14, 1893 #228
        4x Bernard SILBUS [SILBERLUST]  Sep 20, 1876 #666 - Nov 22, 1876 #366
